Article.ArticleTitle: Cryptosporidiosis associated with ozonated apple cider.

AbstractText: We linked an outbreak of cryptosporidiosis to ozonated apple cider by using molecular and epidemiologic methods. Because ozonation was insufficient in preventing this outbreak, its use in rendering apple cider safe for drinking is questioned.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Atlanta, Georgia, USA. blackburn@stanford.edu
